elementSpec.desc: serves as the root element for a concurrent markup stream which will be used to mark page and line numbers of a reference edition of the text.

exemplum.eg: <!DOCTYPE TEI SYSTEM "tei2.dtd" [ <!ENTITY % TEI.XML 'IGNORE' ><!-- SGML --> ]> <!DOCTYPE La SYSTEM "teip2.dtd" [ <!ENTITY % version "La"> ]> <(TEI)TEI><(La)La> <(TEI)TEI.Header> ... </(TEI)TEI.Header> <(TEI)text> <(La)page n='[1]'> ... <(La)page n='4'> ... <(La)page n='5'> ... </(TEI)text> </(La)La> </(TEI)TEI>

remarks.p: May contain character data, vol, and page elements.
The version name should be short (one or two characters), as it must be prefixed to all page and line tags in the concurrent markup stream.
